title: sebastian - blocky irregular font
content:
I need help locating this font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025051709im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sebastian_6350.jpg)

 [‹ Ronnie Fueglister](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025051709/http:/typophile.com/node/48529 "Go to previous forum topic") [Arno Pro ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025051709/http:/typophile.com/node/48512 "Go to next forum topic")
author: vector

comments.content: Check the font list at the bottom of my [Hitchcock font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025051709/http:/typographica.org/001110.php) entry. May find it there.

At first I thought this might be from the House General Collection, but it isn’t. As I look at it more closely I notice that identical letters are not identical, which usually means hand-drawn.

- Mike Yanega
